title: Noam Chomsky - 1993-10-01 (circa) - Totalitarian Values In A Free Society - Improved Sound
description:
Be sure to pick 720p for best sound and video quality. Noam begins speaking at 6:42 in.
On approximately October 1, 1993, Noam Chomsky gave this talk - Totalitarian Values in a Free Society - at Kutztown University in Pennsylvania.  Q&A follows the talk.


For the audio I did a pretty heavy EQing, removing most of booming, echoing sound that Chomsky mentions at the opening.  Also de-noised it, removing a persistent rumble and hiss.  I also went over it, second by second, to remove or reduce most of the audio flubs.  I also cleaned up and boosted audience questions.



For the video, I adjusted the color and contrast to have it all look more natural, but since it was shot in bad lighting conditions, it still has little contrast and poor color, alas.


Earlier I uploaded an audio-only version with inferior sound quality - now deleted.
